00035 typedef struct UA_ServerConfig {
00036     UA_Boolean  Login_enableAnonymous;
00037 
00038     UA_Boolean  Login_enableUsernamePassword;
00039     char**      Login_usernames;
00040     char**      Login_passwords;
00041     UA_UInt32   Login_loginsCount;
00042 
00043     char*       Application_applicationURI;
00044     char*       Application_applicationName;
00045 } UA_ServerConfig;
00046

00107 typedef struct UA_ServerNetworkLayer {
00108     UA_String discoveryUrl;
00109     UA_Logger logger; 
00110 
00118     UA_StatusCode (*start)(struct UA_ServerNetworkLayer *nl, UA_Logger logger);
00119     
00130     size_t (*getJobs)(struct UA_ServerNetworkLayer *nl, UA_Job **jobs, UA_UInt16 timeout);
00131 
00141     size_t (*stop)(struct UA_ServerNetworkLayer *nl, UA_Job **jobs);
00142 
00144     void (*deleteMembers)(struct UA_ServerNetworkLayer *nl);
00145 } UA_ServerNetworkLayer;

00167 typedef struct {
00168     void *handle; 
00169 
00184     UA_StatusCode (*read)(void *handle, const UA_NodeId nodeid, UA_Boolean includeSourceTimeStamp,
00185                           const UA_NumericRange *range, UA_DataValue *value);
00186 
00198     UA_StatusCode (*write)(void *handle, const UA_NodeId nodeid,
00199                            const UA_Variant *data, const UA_NumericRange *range);
00200 } UA_DataSource;
00201 
00202 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00203 UA_Server_setVariableNode_dataSource(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId nodeId,
00204                                      const UA_DataSource dataSource);
00205 
00206 /* Value Callbacks can be attach to variable and variable type nodes. If
00207    not-null, they are called before reading and after writing respectively */
00208 typedef struct {
00209     void *handle;
00210     void (*onRead)(void *handle, const UA_NodeId nodeid,
00211                    const UA_Variant *data, const UA_NumericRange *range);
00212     void (*onWrite)(void *handle, const UA_NodeId nodeid,
00213                     const UA_Variant *data, const UA_NumericRange *range);
00214 } UA_ValueCallback;
00215 
00216 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00217 UA_Server_setVariableNode_valueCallback(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId nodeId,
00218                                         const UA_ValueCallback callback);
00219 
00220 /* The lifecycle management allows to track the instantiation and deletion of
00221    object nodes derived from object types. */
00222 typedef struct {
00223     void * (*constructor)(const UA_NodeId instance); 
00224     void (*destructor)(const UA_NodeId instance, void *instanceHandle);
00225 } UA_ObjectLifecycleManagement;
00226 
00227 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00228 UA_Server_setObjectTypeNode_instanceLifecycleManagement(UA_Server *server, UA_NodeId nodeId,
00229                                                         UA_ObjectLifecycleManagement olm);
00230 
00231 /* Iterate over all nodes referenced by parentNodeId by calling the callback
00232    function for each child node */
00233 typedef UA_StatusCode (*UA_NodeIteratorCallback)(UA_NodeId childId, UA_Boolean isInverse,
00234                                                  UA_NodeId referenceTypeId, void *handle);
00235 
00236 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00237 UA_Server_forEachChildNodeCall(UA_Server *server, UA_NodeId parentNodeId,

00256 /* Don't use this function. There are typed versions as inline functions. */
00257 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00258 __UA_Server_addNode(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeClass nodeClass, const UA_NodeId requestedNewNodeId,
00259                     const UA_NodeId parentNodeId, const UA_NodeId referenceTypeId,
00260                     const UA_QualifiedName browseName, const UA_NodeId typeDefinition,
00261                     const UA_NodeAttributes *attr, const UA_DataType *attributeType, UA_NodeId *outNewNodeId);
00262 
00263 static UA_INLINE UA_StatusCode
00264 UA_Server_addVariableNode(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId requestedNewNodeId,
00265                           const UA_NodeId parentNodeId, const UA_NodeId referenceTypeId,
00266                           const UA_QualifiedName browseName, const UA_NodeId typeDefinition,
00267                           const UA_VariableAttributes attr, UA_NodeId *outNewNodeId) {
00268     return __UA_Server_addNode(server, UA_NODECLASS_VARIABLE, requestedNewNodeId, parentNodeId,
00269                                referenceTypeId, browseName, typeDefinition, (const UA_NodeAttributes*)&attr,
00270                                &UA_TYPES[UA_TYPES_VARIABLEATTRIBUTES], outNewNodeId); }
00271 
00272 static UA_INLINE UA_StatusCode
00273 UA_Server_addVariableTypeNode(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId requestedNewNodeId,
00274                               const UA_NodeId parentNodeId, const UA_NodeId referenceTypeId,
00275                               const UA_QualifiedName browseName, const UA_VariableTypeAttributes attr,
00276                               UA_NodeId *outNewNodeId) {
00277     return __UA_Server_addNode(server, UA_NODECLASS_VARIABLETYPE, requestedNewNodeId, parentNodeId,
00278                                referenceTypeId, browseName, UA_NODEID_NULL, (const UA_NodeAttributes*)&attr,
00279                                &UA_TYPES[UA_TYPES_VARIABLETYPEATTRIBUTES], outNewNodeId); }
00280 
00281 static UA_INLINE UA_StatusCode
00282 UA_Server_addObjectNode(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId requestedNewNodeId,
00283                         const UA_NodeId parentNodeId, const UA_NodeId referenceTypeId,
00284                         const UA_QualifiedName browseName, const UA_NodeId typeDefinition,
00285                         const UA_ObjectAttributes attr, UA_NodeId *outNewNodeId) {
00286     return __UA_Server_addNode(server, UA_NODECLASS_OBJECT, requestedNewNodeId, parentNodeId,
00287                                referenceTypeId, browseName, typeDefinition, (const UA_NodeAttributes*)&attr,
00288                                &UA_TYPES[UA_TYPES_OBJECTATTRIBUTES], outNewNodeId); }

00347 /*************************/
00348 /* Write Node Attributes */
00349 /*************************/
00350 
00351 /* The following node attributes cannot be changed once the node is created
00352    - NodeClass
00353    - NodeId
00354    - Symmetric
00355    - ContainsNoLoop
00356    
00357    The following attributes cannot be written, as there is no "user" in the server
00358    - UserWriteMask
00359    - UserAccessLevel
00360    - UserExecutable
00361 
00362    The following attributes are currently taken from the value variant:
00363    TODO: Handle them independent from the variable, ensure that the implicit constraints hold
00364    - DataType
00365    - ValueRank
00366    - ArrayDimensions
00367    
00368    - Historizing is currently unsupported
00369   */
00370 
00371 /* Don't use this function. There are typed versions with no additional overhead. */
00372 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00373 __UA_Server_writeAttribute(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId nodeId, const UA_AttributeId attributeId, const UA_DataType *type, const void *value);
00374 
00375 static UA_INLINE UA_StatusCode
00376 UA_Server_writeBrowseNameAttribute(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId nodeId, const UA_QualifiedName browseName) {
00377     return __UA_Server_writeAttribute(server, nodeId, UA_ATTRIBUTEID_BROWSENAME, &UA_TYPES[UA_TYPES_QUALIFIEDNAME], &browseName); }
00378 
00379 static UA_INLINE UA_StatusCode
00380 UA_Server_writeDisplayNameAttribute(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId nodeId, const UA_LocalizedText displayName) {
00381     return __UA_Server_writeAttribute(server, nodeId, UA_ATTRIBUTEID_DISPLAYNAME, &UA_TYPES[UA_TYPES_LOCALIZEDTEXT], &displayName); }
00382 
00383 static UA_INLINE UA_StatusCode
00384 UA_Server_writeDescriptionAttribute(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId nodeId, const UA_LocalizedText description) {
00385     return __UA_Server_writeAttribute(server, nodeId, UA_ATTRIBUTEID_DESCRIPTION, &UA_TYPES[UA_TYPES_LOCALIZEDTEXT], &description); }
00386

00388 UA_Server_writeWriteMaskAttribute(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId nodeId, const UA_UInt32 writeMask) {
00389     return __UA_Server_writeAttribute(server, nodeId, UA_ATTRIBUTEID_WRITEMASK, &UA_TYPES[UA_TYPES_UINT32], &writeMask); }

00423 /************************/
00424 /* Read Node Attributes */
00425 /************************/
00426 
00427 /* The following attributes cannot be read, since the "admin" user always has all rights.
00428    - UserWriteMask
00429    - UserAccessLevel
00430    - UserExecutable
00431 */
00432 
00433 /* Don't use this function. There are typed versions for every supported attribute. */
00434 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00435 __UA_Server_readAttribute(UA_Server *server, UA_NodeId nodeId, UA_AttributeId attributeId, void *v);
00436   
00437 static UA_INLINE UA_StatusCode
00438 UA_Server_readNodeIdAttribute(UA_Server *server, UA_NodeId nodeId, UA_NodeId *outNodeId) {
00439     return __UA_Server_readAttribute(server, nodeId, UA_ATTRIBUTEID_NODEID, outNodeId); }
00440
